message.name: ERR_REFUND_AMOUNT_TOO_SMALL
message.locale: The refund amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_REFUND_AMOUNT_TOO_LARGE
message.locale: The refund amount cannot be more than the unallocated amount.

message.name: ERR_REFUND_AMOUNT_AND_REFUND_ALL_ENTERED
message.locale: You should select either refund all or enter a refund amount but not both.

message.name: ERR_CLIENT_METHOD_OF_PAYMENT_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A method of payment must be specified for the client.

message.name: ERR_NO_UNALLOCATED_AMOUNT_FOR_CLIENT
message.locale: %1s does not have any payment received instructions with an unallocated amount.
